description: MalTech informational drawbacks within the OSRS CMCF are related to instances where information from an artifiact is found missing, irrelevant, not congruent, or not complete based on the information supplied within the artifact.  The informational drawbacks allow for the tracking of these types of informational defficiencies.
name: OSRS MalTech Informational Drawbacks

values.description: The artifact contains MalTech information that is uncertain, indefinite, or unclear of character or meaning.
values.value: OSRS CMCF MalTech Informational Drawback: MalTech Artifact Vague

values.description: The artifact contains MalTech related information that does not align to the current MalTech mapping.
values.value: OSRS CMCF MalTech Informational Drawback: MalTech No Relevant Category

values.description: The artifact relates to MalTech information but does not sufficiently describe the event with enough context to understand which MalTech to map to and so therefore the information that would explain this context is considered missing (or) absent.
values.value: OSRS CMCF MalTech Informational Drawback: MalTech Information Absent
